Package com.flipfit.resources

Class GymFlipFitCustomerRestController

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.resources.GymFlipFitCustomerRestController
@Path("/customer") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class GymFlipFitCustomerRestController extends Object
REST controller for customer-related operations. It provides endpoints for viewing slots, booking, making payments, and editing details.

      @GET @Path("/bookings/{customerId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewBookedSlots(@PathParam("customerId") int customerId)
      Endpoint to view a customer's booked slots.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer, passed as a path parameter.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects or an error response.

      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      A Response containing the balance.

      Parameters:
      balanceRequest - A JSON payload with customer ID and the amount to add.

      A success or error response.
